## Supported Versions

|    Version   |      Supported     |
| ------------ | ------------------ |
| 1.17.x-2.x.x | :heavy_check_mark: |
| 1.16.5-2.x.x | :heavy_check_mark: |
| 1.12.x-1.x.x | :x:                |
| 1.11.x-1.x.x | :x:                |
| 1.10.x-1.x.x | :x:                |
|  1.9.x-1.x.x | :x:                |
|  1.8.x-1.x.x | :x:                |
|  1.7.x-1.x.x | :x:                |

Versions marked with :x: is no longer supported. Help to configure these version will not be provided.
